name: Welcome Bot
description: Automatically welcome new members to your channels with customizable messages
author: nchat Team

commands.name: setwelcome
commands.description: Set a custom welcome message for this channel

arguments.name: message
arguments.description: The welcome message (use {user} for username, {channel} for channel name)

commands.name: disablewelcome
commands.description: Disable welcome messages for this channel

commands.name: enablewelcome
commands.description: Enable welcome messages for this channel

triggers.name: User Join Handler
triggers.description: Triggers when a user joins a channel

settings.label: Default Welcome Message
settings.description: Default message when no custom message is set
settings.default: Welcome to {channel}, {user}! We're glad to have you here.

settings.label: Send DM
settings.description: Also send a welcome DM to new members

settings.label: DM Message
settings.description: Message to send in DM (if enabled)
settings.default: Welcome to the server! Let us know if you have any questions.

settings.label: Mention User
settings.description: Mention the user in the welcome message

settings.label: Show Member Count
settings.description: Show the channel member count in welcome message
